class.name: ConstantPoolVisitor
class.javadoc:
A visitor called by {@link ConstantPoolParser#parse(ConstantPoolVisitor)}when a constant pool entry is parsed.

A visit method is called when a constant pool entry is parsed. The first argument is always the constant pool index. The second argument is always the constant pool tag, even for methods like {@link #visitUTF8(int,byte,String)} which only apply to one tag. String arguments refer to Utf8 or NameAndType entries declared elsewhere, and are always accompanied by the indexes of those entries.

The order of the calls to the visit methods is not necessarily related to the order of the entries in the constant pool. If one entry has a reference to another entry, the latter (lower-level) entry will be visited first.

The following table shows the relation between constant pool entry types and the corresponding visit methods:
Tag(s)Method
{@link #CONSTANT_Utf8} {@link #visitUTF8(int,byte,String)}
{@link #CONSTANT_Integer}, {@link #CONSTANT_Float},{@link #CONSTANT_Long}, {@link #CONSTANT_Double} {@link #visitConstantValue(int,byte,Object)}
{@link #CONSTANT_String}, {@link #CONSTANT_Class} {@link #visitConstantString(int,byte,String,int)}
{@link #CONSTANT_NameAndType} {@link #visitDescriptor(int,byte,String,String,int,int)}
{@link #CONSTANT_Fieldref},{@link #CONSTANT_Methodref},{@link #CONSTANT_InterfaceMethodref} {@link #visitMemberRef(int,byte,String,String,String,int,int)}
ConstantPoolPatch Remi Forax jrose

Called for each constant pool entry that encodes an integer, a float, a long, or a double. Constant strings and classes are not managed by this method but by {@link #visitConstantString(int,byte,String,int)}.
index the constant pool index
tag one of {@link #CONSTANT_Integer},{@link #CONSTANT_Float},{@link #CONSTANT_Long}, or {@link #CONSTANT_Double}
value encoded value
ConstantPoolPatch#putConstantValue(int,Object)

Called for each constant pool entry that encodes a string or a class.
index the constant pool index
tag one of {@link #CONSTANT_String},{@link #CONSTANT_Class},
name string body or class name (using dot separator)
nameIndex the index of the Utf8 string for the name
ConstantPoolPatch#putConstantValue(int,byte,Object)

Called for each constant pool entry that encodes a name and type.
index the constant pool index
tag always {@link #CONSTANT_NameAndType}
memberName a field or method name
signature the member signature
memberNameIndex index of the Utf8 string for the member name
signatureIndex index of the Utf8 string for the signature
ConstantPoolPatch#putDescriptor(int,String,String)

Called for each constant pool entry that encodes a field or method.
index the constant pool index
tag one of {@link #CONSTANT_Fieldref}, or {@link #CONSTANT_Methodref}, or {@link #CONSTANT_InterfaceMethodref}
className the class name (using dot separator)
memberName name of the field or method
signature the field or method signature
classNameIndex index of the Utf8 string for the class name
descriptorIndex index of the NameAndType descriptor constant
ConstantPoolPatch#putMemberRef(int,byte,String,String,String)
